title: Moscon 1
description: A program book for the first MosCon in 1979. Guests of Honor: Verna Smith Trestrail and Alex Schomburg. Fan Guest of Honor: Jessica Amanda Salmonson. This program includes biographies of Verna Smith Trestrail, Edward E. Smith, Ph.D, Alex Schomburg, and Jessica Amanda Salmonson; appreciations for Clifford D. Simak, L. Sprague de Camp, and Frederik Pohl; and a special tribute entitled "LARGER THAN LIFE A Memoir in Tribute to Dr. Edward E. Smith" by Robert A. Heinlein.

title: Moscon II
description: A program book for the second MosCon in 1980. Guests of Honor: Jerry Sohl, George Barr, and Frank Denton. This year's program is respectfully dedicated to E.E. "Doc"  Smith. Acknowledgements are due to the following people for their help:(In no particular order) Alex Schomburg, George Barr, Jerry Sohl, Jack Gaughan, Bea Taylor, Beth Finkbiner, Victoria Mitchell, Victoria Poyser, Bob Suto, Verna Smith Trestrail, and every one of the people who gave generously of their time and/or talent to help keep MosCon alive and to make it a good con.

title: MosCon X
description: A special extended program book for the tenth anniversary Moscon in 1988. Guests of Honor: Anne McCaffrey; Lela Dowling; Ken Macklin; Robert L. Forward; Ed and Norma Beauregard. Special thanks to the Telgar Weyr of Spokane, and to all the wonderful volunteers who have made this convention not only possible, but a resounding success. And we would like to thank all the previous committee members of MosCon, without whose tireless efforts this convention would not be nearly as good as it is. Thank you all.
